formatted_address: Level 2, National Heart Centre Singapore, 5 Hospital Dr, Singapore 169609
name: AXS Station

reviews.text: Hidden at one corner on Level 2 of National Heart Centre Singapore. Accessible through lifts or escalators. Make payments to various hospital bills and other transactions with privacy. Sandwiches vending machine, a POSB ATM & wheelchair accessible toilets available.

vicinity: Level 2, National Heart Centre Singapore, 5 Hospital Drive
